Content.Text:
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
...That's what I think, anyway. What
about you, Tina?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Yeah, I see where you're coming from.
But what about...

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>, come on in!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. You here to have some fun too?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It looks like we're already having lots
of fun? So come on, join in!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
We were just playing a game - if we were
men, who would we like to be our
girlfriend?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think Olivia. That kind of mysterious
beauty really intrigues me.
<PAGE>
If everyone's gender was reversed, then
maybe Rod? He's cheerful, and I think
he'd make a good wife!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What about you, <MYNAME>? If you were the
opposite gender, who would you like to
go out with?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah hah hah! No need to make that face.
We're just playing around.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's right. No need to over think it.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see! Yes, you might be right!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
How interesting... so that's your type
is it, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What about you, Felicity?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I think Michelle is really cute, so she
might be nice!
<PAGE>
Also... I'd quite like <MYNAME> to be my
girlfriend!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME> is like a cute little herbivore,
so cuddly and huggable!
<PAGE>
I think I could also expect some
delicious cooking every day!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You might be right. <MYNAME> is a hard
worker, kind, and cute too!
<PAGE>
I see where you are coming from,
Felicity! I'd want <MYNAME> to be my
girlfriend too!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come then, <MYNAME>. Which of us would
you want to be our girlfriend?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, be honest! Me, or Felicity?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Tee hee, it's funny to see you trying to
please us both! Just makes me want to
hug you even harder.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, come closer!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah hah hah! I can't hold it in!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME> really does look like a little
animal, trying to decide what to do! I
can't stop laughing!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah hah hah, we're just kidding around
with you. You really are so cute,
<MYNAME>!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah hah hah, I've laughed so much I'm
all hungry now.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, Tina, why don't we go out for
something to eat?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great idea! You can count me in! You're
coming too, right, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We'll pay, to make it up to you. You can
eat whatever you like, okay?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's go. We can all talk while sharing
a delicious meal.
